metadata.title: CVE-2023-50980 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: gf2n.cpp in Crypto++ (aka cryptopp) through 8.9.0 allows attackers to causea denial of service (application crash) via DER public-key data for anF(2^m) curve, if the degree of each term in the polynomial is not strictlydecreasing.

criterions.comment: libcrypto++ package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
